statements: UPDATE wildlife_data SET population_size = 100, habitat_type = 'Forest' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wildlife_data SET conservation_status = 'Endangered', population_size = 500 WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';

UPDATE wildlife_data SET conservation_status='Endangered', population_size=1000 WHERE species_name='Tiger';

UPDATE wildlife_population SET population_size = 5000, habitat_id = 2 WHERE species_name = 'Elephant';
UPDATE conservation_efforts SET budget = 15000.50, end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_name = 'Save the Tigers';
UPDATE Species SET population_size = 500 WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE Conservation SET conservation_status = 'Endangered', conservation_actions = 'Increase protection measures' WHERE species_id = 2;
UPDATE Population SET population_count = 1000, observation_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE species_id = 1 AND habitat_id = 1;

UPDATE WildlifePopulation SET population_size = 500 WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE ConservationEfforts SET effort_description = 'Monitoring and Protection Program' WHERE habitat_id = 1;
UPDATE WildlifePopulation SET population_size = population_size + 100 WHERE species_name = 'Tiger'
UPDATE ConservationEfforts SET effort_description = 'Implemented new conservation plan' WHERE effort_id = 1
